mapper.select: SELECT C.CSEQ AS CLIENT_SQ, C.NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, C.OWNER, C.PHONE, C.LOCATION, O.OSEQ, O.TITLE, O.SLAVE_SQ, MEM.NAME AS SLAVE_NAME, MEM.POSITION AS SLAVE_POSITION, O.ESTDATE, O.EXPDATE FROM ORDERD O, CLIENT C, MEMBER MEM WHERE O.CLIENT_SQ = C.CSEQ AND O.SLAVE_SQ = MEM.MSEQ AND O.OSEQ = #{oseq}

SELECT OA.OASEQ, OA.APPROVER AS APPROVER_SQ, MEM.NAME AS APPROVER_NAME, MEM.POSITION AS APPROVER_POSITION, PRIORITY, STATE FROM ORDERAPRV OA, MEMBER MEM WHERE OA.APPROVER = MEM.MSEQ AND ORDERD_SQ = #{oseq} ORDER BY PRIORITY
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERAPRV SET STATE = 'Y' WHERE ORDER_SQ = #{param1} AND APPROVER = #{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT OL.OLSEQ, OL.PRODUCT_SQ, P.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, OL.QUANTITY, P.CATEGORY, P.NOTE FROM ORDERLIST OL, PRODUCT P WHERE OL.PRODUCT_SQ = P.PSEQ AND OL.ORDER_SQ = #{oseq} ORDER BY OL.OLSEQ
